name: Mini Tetris
description:
Clear lines and get a high score. Tell me how many lines you can clear. 
Have fun! 😄

Controls:

  • A / Left arrow = Move left
  • D / Right arrow = Move right
  • S / Down arrow =  Speed up
  • W / Up arrow =  Rotate
  • Space = Drop

The downloadable version of the game is available in two languages:

  • English (EN)
  • Serbian (RS)
